name: Superhero special effects
description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

key_work.title: VFX in Thor: Ragnarok
key_work.brief_description: Adelaide-based VFX company Rising Sun Pictures were entrusted with a pivotal moment in Thor: Ragnaork, where Tessa Thompson’s character recounts the fatal encounter between the Valkyrie warriors and the Asgardian Goddess of Death, Hela (Cate Blanchett).

constellations_primary.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_primary.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

start.title: Thor: Ragnarok
start.brief_description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

end.title: USS Callister
end.brief_description: Capt. Robert Daly presides over his crew with wisdom and courage, but a new recruit will soon discover nothing on this spaceship is what it seems.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

links.description: Framestore, the studio responsible for many of the VFX in Thor: Ragnarok also worked on the VFX of the Black Mirror episode ‘USS Callister’ including the creature Arachnajax and the ship itself.

end.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
end.creator_credit: Bryan Singer, Louise Mingenbach, Hutch Parker, Lauren Shuler Donner, Simon Kinberg, 20th Century Fox, Bad Hat Harry Productions, Marvel Entertainment, The Donners' Company, TSG Entertainment, John Myhre, Jane Goldman, Matthew Vaughn and James Baker
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
end.brief_description: The ultimate X-Men ensemble fights a war for the survival of the species across two time periods as they join forces with their younger selves in an epic battle.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

links.description: The slow-mo demise of the Valkyries in Thor: Ragnarok was overseen by VFX studio Rising Sun, who cut their superhero teeth doing the acclaimed slow-mo VFX in X-Men: Days of Future Past.

start.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
start.creator_credit: Joss Whedon, Alexandra Byrne, Kevin Feige, Marvel Studios, Charles Wood and Leonard F.W. Green
start.brief_description: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

end.title: WandaVision
end.creator_credit: Mayes C. Rubeo, Chuck Hayward, Marvel Studios and Mark Worthington
end.brief_description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Retro aesthetics and feminine experiences
constellations_other.description: Discover how design and aesthetics from 1950s and 1960s have been utilised in female stories on screen, revealing how screen makers draw on the perceived optimism and social realities of the period to highlight women’s experiences.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Avengers: Age of Ultron also introduced Quicksilver’s sister, Wanda Maximoff (Elizabeth Olsen), who went on to star in subsequent MCU movies and the first Marvel-produced TV show, WandaVision. The events of Ultron are key to the show’s setting.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

end.title: No Man's Sky
end.brief_description: Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic science-fiction, No Man’s Sky presents you with a galaxy to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action.

constellations_other.name: Infinity and beyond
constellations_other.description: The constantly evolving characters in Infinity are created through procedural generation, a technique that creates special effects, characters, videogame levels and sound via a set of algorithms, predefined rules or data inputs.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

links.description: Infinity, the online world that plays an integral part of the story in ‘USS Callister’ is based on the highly anticipated but widely criticised videogame No Man’s Sky.

end.title: Captain Marvel
end.creator_credit: David J. Grant, Kevin Feige and Michael Furniss
end.brief_description: Brie Larson stars as Captain Marvel, the first female superhero to take centre stage in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel explores a previously unseen period in the MCU and made over $1 billion USD at the box office.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: In WandaVision, Monica Rambeau (Teyonah Parris) is the character who investigates the show’s strange reality. She first appeared as a child (played by Akira Akbar) in Captain Marvel, which Rising Sun also provided VFX for.

start.title: Thor: Ragnarok
start.brief_description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

end.title: Valkyrie costume with sword, sheath and daggers
end.brief_description:
Like Thor, Tessa Thompson’s King Valkyrie had plenty of costume changes throughout Thor: Love and Thunder. Her hero armour has been adapted to fit the bolder, more 80s look of the latest film, with stark, armoured panels of black and white.
Thompson loved the variety of looks for Valkyrie. “I love a costume change,” she said. “You get to see Valkyrie in these suited kingly looks, and then you get to see her in her pyjamas, which I love. Because when have you ever seen a superhero in pyjamas? Even heroes go to sleep.”
She continued: “I think that’s what’s really exciting about these films, in general, is to see the way in which characters evolve.”

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

links.description: One of the most visually stunning (and heartbreaking) scenes in Thor: Ragnarok details the demise of the Asgardian Valkyries against Hela. The last Valkyrie (Tessa Thompson) appears again in Thor: Love and Thunder atop a pegasus.

links.description: The famous slow-mo scene in X-Men: Days of Future Past featured speedster Quicksilver, who was played by Evan Peters. The character also featured in the MCU’s Avengers sequel but was played by Aaron Taylor Johnson.
